word_mean: 远距运动，感应运动：某些人所谓无需接触物体即可使之运动以及无需接触运动中物体即可使之运动的说法

变化系：嘿嘿，用隔空取物（telekinesis）要扔本书什么的在地上然后去抓，升级哗哗的快。　　迷幻系：用Muffle技能，配合高精灵的h…
[说明一下吧！俺是利用念动力（Telekinesis）把地球的磁力线往自己的手里集中，利用这诱电磁力的反应使电流跳走的！提名为磁力 …
「先驱者」——他们都产生了某种超能力(心灵相通,意念传物,等等),并利用这些超...「超级人类」,拥有诸如心灵致动(telekinesis)、远距传动(teleportation)、心灵.

list.abs: the magic item must be within reach of the creature's telekinesis ability , the creature must have line of sight with its target , and the creature must have line of effect between the magic item and the target .该魔法物品必须在此生物的心灵遥控能力射程范围内，此生物和目标之间必须有视线，从魔法物品
you can also have a telekinesis effect by making confetti jump up and down on a table !您也可以隔空效应，使纸屑跳上跳下放在桌上！
telekinesy 远距离作用 telekinetic TelelAmarna Telelectric telelectrocardiogra ph电传心电图 telelectroscope 电传照相机 telelecture 电话授课,电话扬声器 telelight 远传.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from tele- 'at a distance' + Greek kinēsis 'motion' (from kinein 'to move')

means.word_mean: 1. the power to move something by thinking about it without the application of physical force

auth_sentence.content: Telekinesis, teleportation, mind control, are these all within our reach while we live?
